---
category: news
title: "BHP uses Azure AI to increase copper extraction"
excerpt: "BHP and Microsoft have partnered to use artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning to improve copper recovery at the world's largest copper mine, Escondida, in Chile. The project is expected to increase copper recovery by up to 5 per cent, which could generate an additional $1 billion in revenue for BHP each year."
